Articles.Content:
Can you put it in past broadcasts? Wanna see it badly.

How far did you get?

I'm extremely new to Twitch so I am unsure on how to do past broadcasts.

Apologies if this has been covered. I was thinking about using a Tundra as a Duna Ascent Vehicle. With a full crew of Kerbals and a full tank of fuel, can it reach a moderate Duna orbit and dock with a transfer vehicle, or will I need to... Add MOAR BOOSTERS?

Apologies if this has been covered. I was thinking about using a Tundra as a Duna Ascent Vehicle. With a full crew of Kerbals and a full tank of fuel, can it reach a moderate Duna orbit and dock with a transfer vehicle, or will I need to... Add MOAR BOOSTERS?

I have no idea. I've only done missions as far as HKO in the Rodan. It might be able to get into orbit if you refuel on the surface or something, just guessing.

It has ~2200 m/s of delta V (takes around (in my experience) 700m/s to land on Duna and around 900m/s to return). So it should be able to land on duna and return to orbit. However, it won't be able to return to kerbin or get there on its own. So if you plan to do something like colonizing Duna, (which I intend to do) you'd need a mother ship. And whether it could rendezvous with its mother ship is questionable. (most likely it could if you're a pro, but I couldn't without a lot of reserve fuel).

Edited September 16, 2015 by davidy12
I plan to give it a try at some point in the near future. Will post my results, such as they are, with great thanks for your mod.
Don't suppose you plan on redoing the landing legs. They lack the pneumatic rams t the moment

Don't suppose you plan on redoing the landing legs. They lack the pneumatic rams t the moment http://i.imgur.com/6bTrqU8.jpg

Sometime in the future. I did indeed have those modeled but I couldn't find a way to animate them properly.

EDIT: Also 10,000+ downloads!

Have you thought about adding a 6th crew member? I'd really love to see that, plus, that's how many crew men are aboard the ISS.

Stream is finished, a lot got done today.

Have you thought about adding a 6th crew member? I'd really love to see that, plus, that's how many crew men are aboard the ISS.

I have thought of it, but I just can't fit a 6th crew member.

How far you get today?

Is there anyway to make it non RPM?

Is there anyway to make it non RPM?

It should still work without RPM, just less props. The actual Dragon V2 is mostly computer screens and stuff so I thought that RPM would be appropriate.

Version 0.7 is available on KerbalStuff!

-Added Rodan IVA

Loving the IVA! My only complaint is that I just saw this update, just as I am starting work for the day . Otherwise, I would be enjoying my comfy, fancy IVA at the convenience of home....

Seriously though, this looks great!
Loving this mod at the moment, but there is just one thing that gets me: the Falcon 9 first stage engine doesn't seem to gimbal for roll. Any chance this can be looked at?
OOOHHHHHH YEAHHHH!!! Thank you so much buddy!!!!!!

haven't been here on forums or played KSP for a few days and then I see this on my come back

IVA looks good on previews, I'll leave more impressions when I try it.

Sometime in the future. I did indeed have those modeled but I couldn't find a way to animate them properly.

If need be, you can just have it clip inside the tank. That would work fine, I'd say.

The IVA looks great, tygoo!

I will be streaming in about 10 minutes development of the new probe parts!

http://www.twitch.tv/tygoo7

Loving this mod at the moment, but there is just one thing that gets me: the Falcon 9 first stage engine doesn't seem to gimbal for roll. Any chance this can be looked at?

I could check that out.

Loving the IVA! My only complaint is that I just saw this update, just as I am starting work for the day . Otherwise, I would be enjoying my comfy, fancy IVA at the convenience of home....

Seriously though, this looks great!

haven't been here on forums or played KSP for a few days and then I see this on my come back

IVA looks good on previews, I'll leave more impressions when I try it.

Thanks!

If need be, you can just have it clip inside the tank. That would work fine, I'd say.

The IVA looks great, tygoo!

Eh, not too keen on putting landing legs in the tank, the legs are suppose to be a separate part.

I could check that out.

After looking about, it seems that you just need a gimbalTransform for each nozzle. As long as the thrustTransforms and individual nozzle models are parented to the appropriate gimbalTransforms, it should work fine.

Streams over but I did manage to make this thing.

After looking about, it seems that you just need a gimbalTransform for each nozzle. As long as the thrustTransforms and individual nozzle models are parented to the appropriate gimbalTransforms, it should work fine.

I could do something like that in the next update.
So what probes you making now?
